mapper.select:
SELECT m.market_no , m.writer , m.head_code , m.title , m.item_code , m.content , m.price , m.reg_dt , m.thumbnail , m.mobile , m.hit , c.code_nm item_code_nm , co.code_nm head_code_nm , f.file_nm thumbnail_file_nm
FROM market m JOIN codes c ON m.item_code = c.code_no JOIN codes co ON m.head_code = co.code_no JOIN files f ON m.thumbnail = f.file_no
WHERE 1=1 AND m.use_yn = 'Y' AND c.use_yn = 'Y' AND f.use_yn = 'Y'
AND m.item_code = #{item_code }
AND m.title like '%'||#{title }||'%'
ORDER BY reg_dt desc
mapper.update: update market set hit = hit+1 where market_no = #{market_no }
mapper.select: SELECT m.market_no , m.writer , m.head_code , m.title , m.item_code , m.content , m.price , m.reg_dt , m.thumbnail , m.mobile , m.hit , c.code_nm item_code_nm , co.code_nm head_code_nm , f.file_nm thumbnail_file_nm , f.file_no thumbnail_file_no FROM market m JOIN codes c ON m.item_code = c.code_no JOIN codes co ON m.head_code = co.code_no JOIN files f ON m.thumbnail = f.file_no WHERE m.use_yn = 'Y' AND c.use_yn = 'Y' AND writer = #{writer } AND m.market_no = #{market_no } ORDER BY reg_dt desc
